verbose_text: The effects of PA on autophagy remains controversial and may be cell-type dependent; however, accumulating evidence supports that the activation of autophagy at an early stage confers a pro survival effect against lipotoxicity induced cell death, whereas a longer period of exposure to PA leads to impaired autophagic function and apoptotic cell death.
evidence: autophagy at an early stage confers a pro-survival effect against lipotoxicity-induced cell death
